name: samples
description: Demonstrates using NodeJs wrapper for LibIndy through changing the verkey that the ledger associates with a DID

scripts.ledger:start: cd ../../../../ && docker build -f ci/indy-pool.dockerfile -t indy_pool . && docker run --name indy_pool -itd -p 9701-9708:9701-9708 indy_pool
scripts.ledger:stop: docker stop indy_pool && docker rm indy_pool
